name: Dev Clicker
description: Dev Clicker as suggested is a very tedious clicker game, it features the ability to click a laptop to write code, code is used to make games which will give money! there's several different stats, CODE which i already explained, MONEY which is used to hire people to gain CPS (Code Per Second(Gives you CODE every second)) and to pay for lessons which increases CPC (CODE Per CLICK(Defines how much CODE is gained per click)) there is also a LEVEL system, in order to unlock better projects you must level up, right now there's only 2 games to make and they are stupid expensive, enjoy!
